column2: I distinctly recall all of us ooo-ing and awww-ing throughout the dinner
column3: occasionally pleasantly surprised at how delectable something was.  We were all in agreement that the cuisine was exceptional and warranted the hefty price tag (tee hee
column4: thanks boyfriend for paying).  I mean
column5: I thought that my taste buds would've been a little dulled after imbibing in my wine and sake
column6: but the fresh veggies and perfectly grilled and prepared nuggets of vegan goodness left me very confused.  It all looked quite simply prepared
column7: but the rich flavors were complex
column8: yet clean . . . I just don't even know.
